name: ooVoo Log File
summary: Learn about .OVOLOG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You must enable log files in order for ooVoo to create them. Select ooVoo → Settings → Advanced → Support and check the "Enable debug logging" checkbox.
In Windows, the OVOLOG files are stored in the following directory: C:\​Users\​[username]\​AppData\​Roaming\​ooVoo Details\​Logs
In Mac OS X, the OVOLOG files have the .AES extension.

description: File created by ooVoo, a free video chat and messaging application; contains a log of ooVoo activity that is sent to the ooVoo support team when debugging is needed.
